title: The game has crashed!
body:
Right after champ selection, the game has crashed when loading. It shows " The game has crashed. Please try to connect the game." 
When I press "reconnect", it asked me " send a report", "don't send a report"............ please help!! Thank you.

replies.body:
It sounds like you encountered a *Bug Splat*. This issue often pops up when there are system driver or hardware issues locally on your computer. We've gathered a list of common solutions in our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) that I'd like you to try.

Let me know if they helped.
